source.content: Yâ€™all notice #Ferguson & St Louis county have NOT released the autopsy report. Trajectory of bullets matters in death of #MikeBrown

comment.content: @rolandsmartin maybe because it is an ongoing investigation. #Ferguson
@sargeherren @rolandsmartin It's "odd"what info the #Ferguson cops release while"investigating!"Seems self-serving;prelim autopsy?
@rolandsmartin They don't want the ENTIRE truth to come out; only the information to demonize #MichaelBrown...as if their kids are perfect.
@CrystalSaidThat @rolandsmartin They waited a long time before telling truth of Mike Brown's past. Doesn't qualify as demonizing.
@CrystalSaidThat Lots of white people want to know the truth, and care about justice, so why would you even assume that? @rolandsmartin
@CrystalSaidThat @rolandsmartin sounds like you think he robbed that store...the shoes are different sandals in robbery pics sneakers on MB?
@rolandsmartin Yes it does.  Which is why most reasonable people have advocated waiting for ALL facts before jumping to conclusions.
@rolandsmartin Good point!
@rolandsmartin They will have to soon, will they not? I would imagine it will be released with the County Police Commissioners report.
@rolandsmartin trajectory, number of injuries, entrance points
@rolandsmartin yes this police chief is pitiful.
@rolandsmartin when will an arrest take place? #Ferguson
@rolandsmartin it's shocking how ur stirring things up b4 facts come out, one would think you've learned that lesson- sad story though
@krisdalzell4 not stirring up Jack.
@authenticreel we already have the prelim autopsy. He died from GSW. I agree that the police could've been more forthcoming. @rolandsmartin
@kenfreeman11 @rolandsmartin He did NOT have a past, he had a FUTURE. Check your research. That was in the first report! Carry on.
@TheBHolland @rolandsmartin No assumption, turn your tv on. I'm a black mother of 3 young men, and an educator; black men are being killed!
@gig_42 @rolandsmartin just really sad how the tables are trying to be turned, but the truth is not transparent. There's something deeper.
@rolandsmartin Roland, you're not giving 2 sides- ur a reporter right? Report responsibly please , not fair to others man
@sargeherren @rolandsmartin Seriously? We ALL know that!How many shots hit his body,where,how close,etc.Again,unarmed  w/hands up?#Ferguson
@CrystalSaidThat You're assumption is that whites just want to assassinate the character of #MikeBrown. We all need to wait for the facts.
@CrystalSaidThat They are, and most people are saddened and troubled by that. And most blacks are killed by other blacks. @rolandsmartin
@authenticreel what you want is the full autopsy report. That won't be released until the investigation is over. @rolandsmartin
@TheBHolland sincerely, that was not my intent. There are alot of whites joining in with tears. Not my intention to make anyone think that.
@TheBHolland @rolandsmartin Absolutely,  but this is not the case of #MichaelBrown. The focus needs to be on a dead, unarmed black man.
@sargeherren @rolandsmartin  WHY not wait for robbery of store report to be released w/everything too. Info released sides w/cop's story.
@CrystalSaidThat Thank you for clarifying. We all need to stand together and let the investigation unfold. And condemn rioting and looting.
@authenticreel the video does nothing more than justify the stop. It does not justify the shooting. @rolandsmartin
@TheBHolland we've got to start with the atrocities of killing black men first. There has never been rioting were real peace lived first.
@sargeherren @rolandsmartin  If the dispatch timeline matches that point we do agree. STILL not justify shooting.

@CrystalSaidThat If there were more intact homes, then there would be less of need for a police presence.
@CrystalSaidThat I'm not justifying cops who go overboard however.
@qb_ramirez I agree completely! But we also need a full investigation of what happened in #Ferguson. @CrystalSaidThat
@qb_ramirez @TheBHolland and 85% of whites kill whites, but white men are not under seige. Ask blacks who commit crimes, not me!
@TheBHolland but that is for EVERY RACE IN AMERICA, not just blacks.
@TheBHolland @CrystalSaidThat No doubt. No one wants renegade cops shooting w/out cause. Facts need to come out 1st before we indict anyone.
@TheBHolland @qb_ramirez exactly. I hate when the focus is taken off of the issue to talk about black on black crime. Smh.
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland Blacks are under siege by who? Cops have to police areas of ppl that r taught to hate cops. (Cont'd)
@CrystalSaidThat I understand, but let's be honest there is a moral crisis in black America. 70+ % out of wedlock birthdate! @qb_ramirez
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland Crimes go unsolved cuz folks r taught that 'snitches get stitches' & that cops hate u. Vicious cycle. (Cont'd)
@CrystalSaidThat @qb_ramirez We have to be honest about that breakdown, or else we get nowhere!
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland No doubt there r bad cops. I've met some. But most r risking their lives, 4 little pay in hostile neighbohoods
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland & I just can't stand the race hustlers like Al, Black Panthers & Jesse always dividing the country. Sick of it

@qb_ramirez @TheBHolland no prejudice and hate divides the country, but those are the foundations that this country was built on.

@CrystalSaidThat agree that there is an absolute crisis of morality in the black community, and has been so for several decades @qb_ramirez

@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland @qb_ramirez and THAT has nothing to do with race. Has EVERYTHING to do with families and values.
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland @qb_ramirez these facts r unpleasant, but facts none less. Build stronger fams based on moral values is answer

@TheBHolland @CrystalSaidThat @qb_ramirez no she thinks America is racist and its all America's fault, her community has no responsibility.

@CrystalSaidThat @qb_ramirez @TheBHolland YOU are responsible for your choices. not someone else. OWN IT. no one holds you back, stops u.

@psherm07 That's unfortunate. @CrystalSaidThat @qb_ramirez
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland @qb_ramirez MANY people face all kinds of problems and succeed. no excuses. its up to you to succeed. own it.
@CrystalSaidThat We're all sinners, and we all need to repent and take responsibility for our own actions. @qb_ramirez @psherm07
@CrystalSaidThat @TheBHolland @qb_ramirez There are plenty of chances to succeed, just look at college aid, affirm action. work hard, own it
